Articles.Content:
A bowling pin setup for KSP. Get it here. http://pastebin.com/vL2Fnwqa All stock parts.

Max the throttle then hit the spacebar to get the pinsetter out of the way.

How to play? Build something, preferably unguided, to launch at the pins and knock them down. Use standard bowling scoring rules. The launchpad ramp should make it more challenging, while the runway would be more like a traditional bowling alley.

Bowling by g_alan_e, on Flickr
